column1: The Pit Room////We were looking for Texas BBQ and we got Texas BBQ. The service is great and the long line moves quickly
column2: in our case, the line was to the door and we had our food in less than 10 minutes. Ordering a dinner is the way to go here-- the sides are absolutely delicious and totally worth it. BBQ can be expensive, but for $13 this meal is a great deal. I opted for pork ribs with green beans and Mac and cheese. The ribs were so smoky and fell right off the bone. The green beans were heavily spiced and charred
column3: so delicious. The Mac and cheese was creamy and amazing. Do not skip the pickles on the condiment bar
column4: they are spicy and amazing! I love the indoor and outdoor seating options and am so glad that we stumbled across this place on Yelp-- absolutely amazing.
